name: HOLIDAY SPECIAL - BUY 2 BUNDLES GET 1 FREE! GET 20% OFF EXTRA PIECES
description:
Powered by 123ContactForm | Report abuse

If you would like to add any extra bundles or closures to your purchase CLICK HERE to add bundle(s) to cart and then at checkout put in Discount Code SPECIAL to receive 20% off your bundles with purchase. Please Note: Shipping on specials usually takes 4-6 business days but could take 5-7 business days and ALL packages are shipped through USPS Priority Mail with signature confirmation included for your security and protection.

name: Virgin Peruvian Loose Wave 12"-26" Grade 5A
description:
100% Virgin Peruvian Hair is our Top Seller due to it being thicker in texture than Brazilian hair. It blends well with fair African-American hair textures and medium Caucasian hair textures. The hair is available in wavy, straight or curly textures. The curly texture becomes more curly when wet or washed. There is minimal to no shedding of our hair here at Runway Riches, trust you won't be disappointed! Weight: 3.5 oz

Color: All Hair comes in natural color 1b to 2

Styling: 2-3 or sometimes 4 bundles are generally used based on desired fullness and length.

Note: Hair Last anywhere from 1 Year to 18 months with proper hair care and maintenance

BUNDLE DEALS WHEN PURCHASING 4 OR MORE BUNDLES, DISCOUNT CODE AT CHECK OUT IS PLUSMORE

To inquire about this hair CLICK HERE to email us.

Click Here for Hair Care Instructions Please Note: Shipping takes 4-6 business days and ALL packages are shipped through USPS Priority Mail with signature confirmation included for your security and protection.

name: Virgin Malaysian Body Wave 12"-28" Grade 5A
description:
100% Pure Virgin Malaysian Hair works really well blended with relaxed African American hair. Malaysian hair has a high amount of gloss to it naturally, so it may be better to use a lower amount of oil based products on the hair, at least until you've washed it a few times. There is minimal to no shedding of our hair here at Runway Riches, trust you won't be disappointed!

Weight: 3.5Oz

Color: All Hair comes in natural color 1b to 2

Styling: 2-3 bundles are generally used based on desired fullness.

Note: Hair Last anywhere from 9 months to 1 Year and beyond with proper hair care and maintenance

name: Remy Human Hair Tape Extensions 16"-24" (20 pcs)
description:
100% Remy Human Hair Seamless Tape Extensions 20 weft tabs per bag Texture is Silky Straight, this hair can be curled, straightened and dyed! Very high quality, tangle-free and silky soft!

You will receive 20 Seamless Tape On Wefts, the hair is available in your choice of color. Select your length and add to cart, then come back and select your hair color and add to cart. For a full head to look natural, it is suggested to use 40 of the Seamless Tape Wefts.

The Tape is already attached, which saves you lots of time! You can also add bonding glue to the tape for a more secure attachment, and the extensions will stay in for 4 to 6 weeks before needing to be redone.

Colors available: Please Note: Shipping takes 4-6 business days and ALL packages are shipped through USPS Priority Mail with signature confirmation included for your security and protection.

name: Coloring Services
description: Our ombre hair service is offered to our customers who purchase hair from our store. This is an added service, once hair is selected just add your color to the cart. For example: If you have 3 bundles, you will need to add the color selection 3 times to the cart.These colors are a high ombre, not fully colored bundles. To inquire or if you have another color in mind, please email us.
